FList.name: FList
FList.description:
FList is a filterable list created over an HTML unordered list that allows
extremely simple filtering with animation support.

params.name: list
params.description: A jQuery DOM `<ul>` or `<ol>` to create an FList around

classitems.description: Filter the filter list by a given filter string, with animations.
classitems.name: filter

params.name: filter_string
params.description: Query to filter the list by

classitems.description: Constructs a function to test a DOM element by the filter query.
classitems.name: selector

params.name: positive
params.description:
True if a positive match should indicate a true 
       return value, false if a positive match should indicate a false
       return value.

params.name: query
params.description: Query to test the DOM Element on

return.description:
Function to test a DOM Element by the query, modifying 
        the return value by whether or not this should be a "positive" 
        function

classitems.description: Determines if a given element is positively selected by the filter query.
classitems.name: positiveSelector

params.name: el
params.description: The element to test for positivity

params.name: index
params.description: Index of the element in the filter list

params.name: query
params.description: Query to test the given element on

return.description: True if the element matches the query, false otherwise

classitems.description: Gets the default height of an element in the list.
classitems.name: getDefaultHeight

params.name: List
params.description: element to retrieve the default height of

return.description: Default height (in pixels) of the list element

classitems.description: Gets the default width of an element in the list.
classitems.name: getDefaultWidth

params.name: List
params.description: element to retrieve the default width of

return.description: Default width (in pixels) of the list element

classitems.description: Retrieves a jQuery list of all invisible/hidden elements depending on the filter.
classitems.name: getInvisibleElements

return.description: List of invisible/hidden elements in the list

classitems.description:
Retrieves the maximum height of all child elements.  This is calculated by
looping through all elements to compare heights.
classitems.name: getMaxElementHeight

return.description: Max height of all elements in the list

classitems.description:
Retrieves the maximum width of all child elements.  This is calculated by
looping through all elements to compare widths.
classitems.name: getMaxElementWidth

return.description: Max width of all elements in the list

classitems.description: Retrieves a jQuery list of all visible elements depending on the filter.
classitems.name: getVisibleElements

return.description: List of visible elements in the list

classitems.description:
Function to set the delay (in milliseconds) between animations as elements 
are filtered out of a list.  For example, if this is set to 5 ms, the first 
filtered out element will immediately start its animation, the second one 
will start the animation in 5 ms, the third in 10 ms, etc.
classitems.name: setAnimDelay

classitems.description:
Generates a function to hide a list element by sliding it to the left
for use with the FList.hide function.
classitems.name: hideLeft

return.description:
A function that takes a jQuery list element and
        animates it by sliding it to the left and decreasing its 
        height to hide it from view.

classitems.description:
Generates a function to hide a list element by sliding it to the right
for use with the FList.hide function.
classitems.name: hideRight

return.description:
A function that takes a jQuery list element and 
        animates it by sliding it to the right and decreasing its 
        height to hide it from view.

classitems.description:
Generates a function to hide a list element by imitating jQuery's
slideUp function, for use with the FList.hide function.
classitems.name: hideSlide

return.description:
A function that takes a jQuery list element and
        animates it by sliding it up like jQuery's slideUp function.

classitems.description:
Generates a function to show a list element by sliding it from the left
for use with the FList.hide function.
classitems.name: showLeft

return.description:
A function that takes a jQuery list element and
        animates it by increasing its height and sliding it from the
        left.

classitems.description:
Generates a function to show a list element by sliding it from the right
for use with the FList.show function.
classitems.name: showRight

return.description:
A function that takes a jQuery list element and 
        animates it by increasing its height and sliding it from the 
        right.

classitems.description:
Generates a function to show a list element by imitating jQuery's
slideDown function, for use with the FList.show function.
classitems.name: showSlide

return.description:
A function that takes a jQuery list element and
        animates it by imitating jQuery's slideDown function.

classitems.description:
Hides a given jQuery element of the filter list.  Change this function to 
change animation behavior.  The replacing function must accept one 
parameter, which is the jQuery list element to hide.
classitems.name: hide

classitems.description:
Shows a given jQuery element of the filter list.  Change this function to 
change animation behavior.  The replacing function must accept one 
parameter, which is the jQuery list element to show.
classitems.name: show

classitems.description:
Create a function to update an element; hide an element if it should be 
hidden, show an element if it should be shown.
classitems.name: updateElement

return.description: A function that hides/shows the list element when called

classitems.description:
Compounds an update function that shows/hides all elements.  The resulting
update function is a function that calls an update function for each list
element in turn to hide/show the element as specified.
classitems.name: update

params.name: updateFunction
params.description:
The composite update function that updates 
       all of the list elements so far

params.name: list_element
params.description:
An element of the list to potentially update.
       If the element is showing, but should be hidden, compound its update 
       into the function and vice versa.

params.name: show
params.description:
Indicates whether this list element should be shown 
       or not

return.description:
An updated composite function that updates all elements 
        in the list appropriately when called, with a proper timeout 
        between each animation/update
